name: Reddio USDT
description: Reddio is a high performance parallel Ethereum-compatible Layer 2, leveraging zero-knowledge technology to achieve unrivaled computation scale with Ethereum-level security. Reddio compatibility with Ethereum's APIs. All smart contracts deployed on Ethereum can be seamlessly implemented on Reddio. The blockchain is currently in its testing phase, and can be utilized for trial purposes. The lead investors in Reddio's seed round include Paradigm.
